predicate.note: Frames file for 'unnerve' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: cause to be nervous

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Meanwhile, Wall Street's volatility unnerved investors in other markets.

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John unnerved Mary with his stunning impersonation of a corpse.
example.arg: his stunning impersonation of a corpse

roleset.note: As with other verbs of this class, only use arg2 when arg0 is also present.
